---
title: "Mp4"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT DISTINCT(title), production_year, mi1.info 
  FROM movie_info AS mi1
    JOIN movie_info AS mi2 ON mi2.movie_id = mi1.movie_id
    JOIN title AS t ON mi1.movie_id = t.id
    WHERE mi1.info_type_id = 107 
    AND  production_year BETWEEN 1960 and 1969
    AND mi2.info_type_id = 8
    AND mi2.info = 'USA'
    HAVING mi1.info LIKE '$%'
    ORDER BY mi1.info desc;")
```
